description:
Kyosuke worries about what will happen with Madoka after a foreboding dream, and tries to take up karate after a wrestler taunts him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Foreboding Dream! Madoka and Kyosuke Breaking Up At Last!
Un sogno premonitore! Madoka e Kyosuke in rotta
Yochimu! Madoka to Kyousuke Tsuini Hakyoku
予知夢!まどかと恭介ついに破局!
